sourcesContent:
import React,{useState}from "react"; //Style Of Component import './creationRow.scss'; const CreationRow = ( {listComplete, setListComplete} ) => { const [ addWork, setAddWork ]= useState({ id:null , name:"", description:"", status:"" }) const addWorkList = () => { setAddWork({ ...addWork, id:listComplete.length }) const newList = [...listComplete]; newList.push(addWork) setListComplete( newList ) } return( <>
setAddWork({ ...addWork, name: event.target.value }) } />
setAddWork({ ...addWork, description: event.target.value }) } />
) } export default React.memo(CreationRow);
